title: Global distribution systems : company revenues 2017
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in each Company on the y axis.
The Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Company Amadeus and lowest at Company Travelport.
There is a difference of 3.36 between the maximum Company Amadeus and minimum Company Travelport.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Company Amadeus and lowest at Company Travelport.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in each Company on the y axis.
The Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Company Amadeus and lowest at Company Travelport.
There is a difference of 3.36 between the maximum Company Amadeus and minimum Company Travelport.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion U.S. dollars for 3 number of Companys.
The maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars 5.81 is found at Company Amadeus and the minimum is found at Travelport where Company is 2.45.
Company Sabre has the second highest value for Revenue in billion U.S. dollars.
The difference of Revenue in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Company is 3.36.
The average Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in all 3 Companys is 3.95.
The Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is 11.86 if we add up values of all Companys.
